text: @replouiegohmert So, you caught the 'Rona?  Sorry about that, I'm sure your family will help you.  Oh, shoot, forgot about the fact that they all hate you and voted against you.  Just read an article that 75% of COVID-19 patients have damaged hearts.  You're good though, you don't have one.
